short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts visible text from web pages and displays it in a field where it can be copied

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text Extractor is a simple and efficient tool for extracting visible text from any webpage. With just a click, the extension gathers all the readable content and displays it in a convenient field, ready to be copied to your clipboard. Whether you're compiling research, organizing notes, or just need to grab content from a web page, Text Extractor makes the process fast and hassle-free.

No more copying text section by sectionâ€”get everything in one go and streamline your workflow!
